title: How difficult is it to write in third person perspective when you’re used to first person? - Quora

response.answer_text: not that big of a difference if you’re a good writer. sometimes it’s a little difficult because you’ll start writing in first person again, but if you’re doing it to improve you’re writing you keep that in the back of your mind, knowing you need to stick to third person pronouns and actions. at first it seems a little odd but it’s not difficult to get the hang of. hope that helped :)

Oh, it’s an adjustment. But not impossible. Remember to focus on that character’s POV. The way I look at it is writing the main character from first person with a couple supporting characters in third. And place them in separate chapters. Although everyone’s different.
